name: The Itinerant
description:
You always dream of the staircase...

It has consumed your life.

You must climb it.

You must.

Created in 5 days for Haunted's PS1 Wretched Weekend Jam #1. Crew

Christopher Risewick: Programming, Level Design, 3D Modelling, Writing, Music, Sound Design, Voice Acting (http://portfolio.shorewick.ca)

Colt Morell: Level Design, 3D Modelling (https://morr0667.myportfolio.com/)

Connor Grail: Sound Design, Voice Acting (https://connorgrail.com/)

Layla Brown: Voice Acting

Also featuring the voices of Nick Lemmon (https://nickthesic.itch.io/) & Mieke Uhryniuk-Smith
